options.name: Single Room
options.description: A room assigned to one person

options.name: Double Room
options.description: A room assigned to two person

options.name: Twin Room
options.description: A room with two beds

options.name: Double King Room
options.description: A room with a king-sized bed

options.name: Double Queen Room
options.description: A room with a queen-sized bed

options.name: Triple Room
options.description: A room assigned to three people

options.name: Quad Bedroom
options.description: A room assigned to four people

options.name: Double-double Room
options.description: A room with two double (or perhaps queen) beds

options.name: Studio Hotel Room
options.description: A room with a studio bed â€“ a couch that can be converted into a bed. May also have an additional bed

options.name: Suite or Master Suite
options.description: A parlour or living room connected to one or more bedrooms

options.name: Junior Suite
options.description: A single room with a bed and sitting area. Sometimes the sleeping area is in a bedroom separate from the parlour or living room

options.name: Connecting Room
options.description: Rooms with individual entrance doors from the outside and a connecting door between. Guests can move between rooms without going through the hallway

options.name: Adjacent Room
options.description: Rooms close to each other, perhaps across the hall

options.name: Adjoining Room
options.description: Rooms with a common wall, but no connecting door

options.name: President Suite
options.description: The most expensive room provided by a hotel. Usually, only one president suite is available in one single hotel property. Similar to the normal suites, a president suite always has one or more bedrooms and a living space with a strong emphasis on grand in-room decoration, high-quality amenities and supplies, and tailor-made services (e.g. personal butler during the stay)

options.name: Presidential Suite
options.description: The most expensive room provided by a hotel. Usually, only one president suite is available in one single hotel property. Similar to the normal suites, a president suite always has one or more bedrooms and a living space with a strong emphasis on grand in-room decoration, high-quality amenities and supplies, and tailor-made services (e.g. personal butler during the stay)

options.name: Apartments
options.description: Open kitchens, cooking equipment, dryer, washer etc. are usually available in the room. Usually housekeeping services are only provided once in a week or two times in a week

options.name: Murphy Room
options.description: A room that is fitted with a sofa bed or a Murphy bed (i.e. a bed that folds out of a wall or closet) which can be transformed from a bedroom in the night time to a living room in daytime

options.name: Disabled Room
options.description: This room type is mainly designed for disabled guests and it is required by law that hotels must provide a certain number of accessible rooms to avoid discrimination

options.name: Accessible Room
options.description: This room type is mainly designed for disabled guests and it is required by law that hotels must provide a certain number of accessible rooms to avoid discrimination

options.name: Cabana Room
options.description: This type of room is always adjoining to the swimming pool or have a private pool attached to the room

options.name: Villa
options.description: It is a kind of stand-alone house which gives extra privacy and space to hotel guests. A fully equipped villa contains not only bedrooms and a living room but a private swimming pool, Jacuzzi and balcony. It is suitable for couples, families and large groups

options.name: Hollywood Twin Room
options.description: It is a very comfortable twin room containing a double bed with two single beds joined by a similar headboard

options.name: Deluxe Room
options.description: This room type includes several rooms, usually a living room and a bed room. It may also have a separate functional kitchen

options.name: Super Deluxe Room
options.description: For Luxury lovers, a super deluxe hotel room might just be the ideal room option for you. It is an upgrade of the standard deluxe room

options.name: Penthouse
options.description: A penthouse is a unit or an apartment on the highest floor of the hotel, condominium or apartment building. They are different for the unique amenities they offer (ex. swimming pool, private elevator, terrace, jacuzzi...))

options.name: Duplex Room
options.description: This type is composed of two rooms located on two different floors, connected with internal stairs

options.name: Lanai Room
options.description: This room faces a landscape, a waterfall, or a garden
